alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Delaware County through 100 PM EDT... At 1215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meredith, or near Delhi, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delhi, Meredith, Meridale, East Meredith and East Delhi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
